captions.text: I'm crazy
And I'm right
The big fat chick stunk
Like beef
And candy depression
And gum and stuff
And if I see her sick
Maybe I'm embarrassed.
And I hold it so it's a fancy fist with joy!
I'd borrow meat
To provide for my puddy tat.
Get the pop tart!
We got 69 ankle shoes
No no no no not no damn BANANA shoe
Eleven hos can't come in here and keep they shoes off
You know what the crowd says,
We all homosexual…
Umm, that made absolutely no sense
I had some porn, and I swore
And a weird witch gagged me
Umm, my old burrito princess had a tee pee
And we'd go vomit in two different food stairwells in the Americas
In between then we'd surf
We all leave skidders.
I'm living for donuts and venison
And that's true
And specialty gopher meat
The first time I drank I had my shoes under my arm
Because I mean I was SO sick, I mean, SO barf-tastic
I puked on the pizza
And this orange was just sitting there for me
For me to take it out at lunch and shave its peel off.
I was confused and I didn't want to have to decide to read words.
The zoo was all I believed in
I just want to practice soft algebra, please?
Scissors?
Frankie???
The Black Bandit took one of my top seaweeds out of my basket
Umm, umm, I know a few Asian guys
Fairy crutches are bullsh**
Tacos and eggwhites
Yeah, you're not gonna win
But diarrhea is okay
One time I just let it shoot off
And it went on half a block.

comments.text:
I started watching this with some skepticism, but not past the 0:13 mark, 
no. Then I'm sold. Dude's crazy... but he's right. Good times lie ahead 
with Rick Santorum.﻿
comments.author: Tom-Bot

comments.text:
You have to wonder if the big fat chick, his old burrito princess, the 
weird witch, and the black bandit aren't all the same person. Plot twist, 
everybody, he's been talking about his wife this whole time!﻿
comments.author: seawarrior14

comments.text:
0:50 to 1:03, he's confessing his sins. 1:28 to 1:33, he's describing his 
rough-and-tumble childhood. And he apparently barfs a lot: at 1:00 he and 
unidentified others are going and barfing in two different food stairwells 
in the Americas, at 1:20 he puked on the pizza (as well as being 
barf-tastic), and while this does not directly refer to vomit, he may be 
embarassed at 0:21 if he sees the big fat chick sick. And "sick" does mean 
puke in Great Britain...﻿
comments.author: Tor Parsons

comments.text:
1. Recycled joke about how the politician makes more sense here than he 
does in real life: check
2. Favorite quotes re-written: check
3. Not-so-entertaining short story about how funny this was that you fell 
on the floor or snorted soda all over your computer: check.
Yep, classic BLR comments!﻿

comments.text:

4. A mockery comment written in the form of a list including all 
stereotypical sorts of comments found on this panel, except of course it's 
own kind.
I'm kind of breaking the rules on the last part. But I feel, somewhere deep 
down in my heart, now... it is complete :')

comments.author: Max Thomas

comments.text:
I think this BLR political video stands apart from the others because it 
actually makes the subject seem more likable than in real life.  Aside from 
his horrid positions, Rick Santorum in real life comes across as an 
aggressive, arrogant, loud-mouthed prick, but the BLR Rick Santorum seems 
like a likable, soft spoken, introspective guy, even if the introspection 
is about his willingness to borrow meat and reflections on his diarrhea 
trajectory.﻿
